description.value: Your limbs and trunk grow strong and thick enough to shield your allies from danger. You can share your space with up to one willing ally. While an ally is sharing space with you or occupying an adjacent square, your ally gains the benefits of lesser cover. The ally can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Take Cover] to increase the bonus to standard cover.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
